name: Griefwood Clearing
description: A small clearing bathed in dim light where ancient stones rise from the earth. The air here hums with old power.

points_of_interest.name: Ancient Standing Stones
points_of_interest.description: Weathered stone monoliths that predate recorded history. They hum with barely contained magical energy.

exploration.description: The mystical clearing pulses with ancient energies, offering unique opportunities for exploration.
dangers: Griefwood creatures are drawn to this place
The stones may react to magical disturbances
scout_discoveries: You notice the stones are aligned with celestial bodies.
You see strange markings carved into the ancient stones.
You observe that local wildlife avoids the stone circle.
You detect faint magical emanations from the ground.
meditation_insights: You sense the stones were used for ancient rituals involving the three moons.
The magical energy here feels connected to the Griefwood's spiritual essence.
You perceive echoes of long-forgotten ceremonies performed here.
The stones seem to amplify magical energies during certain moon phases.
investigation_discoveries: You find ancient runes carved into the base of the stones.
You discover that the stones are positioned in a specific magical pattern.
You notice that the stones show signs of recent ritualistic use.
You uncover hidden compartments containing old ceremonial items.
